headline: Mahomes ready for big divisional clash
content: Patrick Mahomes is expected to deliver another strong performance in the upcoming divisional matchup against the Raiders. Coaches have praised his consistency and leadership...

headline: Jefferson questionable with hamstring tightness
content: Justin Jefferson has been listed as questionable for Sunday’s game after reporting hamstring tightness in practice. The Vikings medical staff will make a game-day decision...

headline: McCaffrey dominates in prime-time win
content: Christian McCaffrey rushed for over 150 yards and scored twice in the 49ers’ statement victory. His performance solidifies him as one of the league’s top offensive threats...
